long long int gcd(long long int,long long int);

        //if(a==b==1)

        //else{

            c=(a/2)*((b+1)/2)+((a+1)/2)*(b/2);
            d=a*b;

            cout<<c/x<<"/"<<d/x<<endl;

    //}
     return 0;
}

long long int gcd(long long int c,long long int d){

    if(d==0)
        return c;
    else return gcd(d,c%d);

}
